title: Tales of the Undead - Suffer Eternal: volume II
description: The immortal of the underworld make a welcome return for the second installment of 'Tales of the Undead - Suffer Eternal', and are looking forward to reacquainting themselves with your jagged nerves. Over twenty new and established authors from around the world will attempt to scare, sicken and repulse the living daylights out of you, as they describe the horrors that can come from simply living too long.
author: Nathan J.D.L. Rowark
